QuestData.Title: A Beacon in the Dark
QuestData.Description: That was... an intense experience.$b$b<Alleria rubs her forehead.>$b$bIt is difficult to focus. I need you to return to Velen. Give him this.$b$b<She places something cold and dense in your palm.>$b$bI feel as though he should have it, though I am not sure why.$b$bTell him all that we have learned. I am sure Romuul will have been watching our progress. With any luck, a beacon is already headed our way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Remnant of Nhal'athoth to Velen on the Vindicaar.
QuestData.RewardText: What is it you bring, $n?$b$b<Velen peers down upon the cold, dense object.>$b$bIntriguing...
